channel.description: Recent content in Our Team on Awe-AI

item.title: Alice Zhang
item.description: Team Lead focusing on AI agent architectures and large language model research. Ph.D. from Tsinghua University.

item.title: Bob Li
item.description: Senior Engineer specializing in distributed systems and AI infrastructure. Architect of the SWALM Portal and container orchestration platform.

item.title: Carol Wang
item.description: Research Scientist working on multimodal reasoning and vision-language models. Published at CVPR, ECCV, and AAAI.

item.title: David Chen
item.description: Research Engineer focused on code intelligence, program synthesis, and AI-assisted software development tools.

item.title: Emma Liu
item.description: Research Scientist specializing in training data curation, model fine-tuning, and alignment techniques for code LLMs.

item.title: Frank Wu
item.description: Engineer specializing in evaluation systems, benchmark design, and performance analysis for AI agents.
